outpreform.hero_description: Own entire casks of whiskey. Limited availability.

benefits.description_3: Take the sting out of tough times with a recession-resistant asset

benefits.description_5: Don’t want to sell your cask? Opt to have it bottled

benefits.title: Whiskeyvest Exclusive Benefits

american.name: American
american.description: An assortment of high-end new fill American whiskey. Mainly single grain casks of corn, rye, wheat, and barley. To be utilized by well-known American craft whiskey brands such as Whistle Pig, Breckenridge Distillery, and High West Distillery.

new_age_scotch.name: New Age Scotch
new_age_scotch.description: New fill casks from the Holyrood Distillery, the first distillery in Edinburgh, Scotland in a 100 years. Two options available: heavily peated and rauch malt.

ultra_rare_scotch.name: Ultra-Rare Scotch
ultra_rare_scotch.description: A select ultra-premium cask of Scotch from well-known producers such as Highland Park, Macallan, Ardmore, and many more.

lowrisk.description: Enjoy a low correlation with traditional markets and historically high returns.

hassle.description: We authenticate, store and insure your casks for you. Fancy a drink? You own your whiskey, so just ask and we’ll send you a sample.

less.description: When you invest through us, we cut out middlemen and pass the savings along to you. More for less? Yup, Exactly right.
